column4: any of you guys ever had any trouble with copying new songs to an ipod/iphone using rythmbox? i just tried copying a few songs to both my iphone and ipod... but i think it does something wrong - i can't play any of them. *sniff sniff*
Try gtkpod
thanks bro :) i will give that a spin
If your ipod is formatted with a mac, you will have to reformat it FAT to work with linux
i have never formated it ever... it worked fine on 10.04 tho
all the songs on both my ipod and iphone was copied using rythmbox in 10.04
WHICH IPOD IS IT?
both ipod nano and iphone 3g
not sure about the nano... it's an 8gb but not sure which generation
anything up to 5g should work. The new ones I`m not sure on
ok i'll try to disable journaling and see what happens.. thanks a million for your help bro! very much appreciated
Like I say try gtkpod, it works very well with my kids 5g nano
roger that i just installed it :)
tried gtkpod one song got successfully transfered and plays fine.. :) but the others still dont work.. weird eh? trying to figure something out
I use gnupod, I don`t recomend it for desktop user. You may have to redo your ipod with gtkpod. Have you used your ipod on another machine?
yes i have another laptop where i transferred songs from too... also running ubuntu
that shouldn`t matter, both 10.04 +?
aye the one i'm currently transfering from is 10.10
Can`t speak, works with my kid's nano fine??????
i'm gunna figure this out :) and once i do i'm gunna let you know... thanks a million for your help bro
No problem :)
think i figured something out... if i transfer the music files and wait 20 minutes it syncs a few times and then the transfered files seems to work :)
